pr_title: Add type checking and linting for templates

timeline.message: Add type checking and linting for templates

timeline.bodyText: looks like we are going back a major version, why is that?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: We don't depend on this package directly, this is just what version npm decided we need to satisfy all of our direct dependencies.
replies.author: nikklassen
